QuestData.Title: A Delivery for Thorg'izog
QuestData.Description: General Thorg'izog is staying among the ogres in the Firegut Furnace, a cave on the western edge of Dreadmaul Rock. I'd like you to deliver this to him and the ogres.$b$bInside this package, you will find the worg cutlets you obtained, marinated in the fel slider cider that we took from the Altar of Storms.$b$bI would avoid eating it if I were you.$b$bBring it to General Thorg'izog. He will make sure that his troops are fed and, with any luck, he will eat some himself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Using your Blackrock Disguise, bring the Slider Cider-Marinated Cutlets to General Thorg'izog at Firegut Furnace in Burning Steppes. Speak with Eitrigg if you need a new Blackrock Disguise.
QuestData.RewardText: Well would you look at that! My favorite soldier comes through in the clutch!$b$bI'll make sure to get this distributed among the ogres.$b$bI'll see you in Redridge, soldier. For the glory of the Blackrock!
